text_en: xxiv DSM-5 Classification 327.42 (G47.52) Rapid Eye Movement Sleep Behavior Disorder (192) 333.94 (G25.81) Restless Legs Syndrome (193) ___.__ (___.__) Substance/Medication-Induced Sleep Disorder (193) Note: See the criteria set and corresponding record- ing procedures for substance-specific codes and ICD-9-CM and ICD-10-CM coding.
